wikitext.*:
'''''nelya''''' is a [[Quenya]] adjective which means "third".  Its plural form is ''nelyë''.

As a proper noun, it describes one of the [[Nelyar]]—those original [[Elves]] that later became the [[Teleri]] after they began the [[Great March]].

==Examples==
* [[Nelyafinwë]] = Third Finwë
